title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 80.11 - Filing fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 80.11 - Filing fees

State Regulations

All filings and applications for exemption from the prospectus requirements should
be accompanied by a filing fee equal to one-half of one percent of the offering (.005 times the offering). The minimum fee is $25 and the maximum fee
is $1500. Checks should be made payable to the Department of Law and need not be certified. There are no filing fees for amendments (except where
additional securities are added) or annual reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
80.11

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
